meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>cut</kanji> your <kanji>abdomen</kanji>. This is what you do when you're doing <vocabulary>harakiri</vocabulary>, aka <vocabulary>ritual suicide</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The readings come from 腹 and 切る. If you're lucky, you already know the word harakiri as it's made its way into English as well.
